text:
e="preserve">Robert Batailly (2 March 1934 – 27 November 2017) was a French politician.
He was born in Bourg-de-Thizy, Batailly later moved to Lyon. Batailly was a member of the Radical Party, he sat on the European Parliament in 1989. Batailly was named a commander of the Legion of Honor in 2010.
Batailly died on 27 November 2017 at the age of 83.
